io.janusproject.services.network

Class EventEnvelope

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.janusproject.services.network.EventEnvelope
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class EventEnvelope
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Envelope of a message that is exchanged other the network.

    A EventEnvelope can be transformed into/from a EventDispatch with a EventSerializer.

    Version:
    2.0.2.0 2015-04-09 09:04:05
    Author:
    Sebastian Rodriguez, Nicolas Gaud, Stéphane Galland
    See Also:
    EventDispatch, EventSerializer, Serialized Form
    Maven Group Id:
    io.janusproject
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.janusproject.kernel

             byte[] body)
        Construct an envelope.
        Parameters:
        contextId - - identifier of the context in which the event occurs.
        spaceID - - identifier of the space in which the event occurs.
        scope - - scope for the event.
        headers - - custom header associated to the event.
        body - - body of the event.
